sentences.en: Franchise let . Docklands Railway Management Limited ( DRML ) takes over operation of DLR as the Franchisee.

sentences.en: In December 2000, our first overseas franchisee opened their restaurant in Korea.
sentences.cn: 蕉叶咖喱屋首间加盟店在2000年于韩国正式营业.

sentences.en: Route 3 ( Country Park Section ) is managed and operated by the private sector franchisee.

sentences.en: The Franchisor will be entitled to recover from the Franchisee all funds due under this Agreement.
sentences.cn: 授权者将有权在合同到期日收回总经销商的所有资金.

sentences.en: The Marriott hotel at Los Angeles airport also became a franchisee during 1991.
sentences.cn: 万豪酒店在洛杉矶机场也成为特许经营者在1991年.

sentences.en: To be responsible for the continuous communication and maintenance with landlord and franchisee.
sentences.cn: 在责任区域内的门店后期与店铺业主及加盟商的沟通及维护.

sentences.en: Two groups discussing what qualities a Franchisee should have.
sentences.cn: 两个小组在讨论被特许人需要具备什麽品质.

sentences.en: Upon expiration of the contract, the security deposIt'shall be refunded to the franchisee.
sentences.cn: 合同到期后, 保证金应退还被特许人.

sentences.en: We are customer - facing groups: provincial and municipal agent, franchisee, shopping malls, shops, beauty salons.
sentences.cn: 我们所面对客户群体: 各省市代理 、 加盟商 、 商场 、 专卖店 、 美容院.

sentences.en: What are the benefits and drawbacks of being a franchisee?
sentences.cn: 什么是好处和缺点是特许经营者?

trans.tran_en: someone who is given or sold a franchise to sell a company’s goods or services
